patthana16.56:4.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ lokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho nalokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.56:5.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nalokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.56:5.3: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … avigate cha.
